name: Mermaid Isle [Demo]
description:
Mermaid Isle is a game in development for NaNoReNo 18! It's a short visual novel about friendship, mermaids, and fishing!

The Demo is Now Live! 

The demo contains:

  • two fishing spots
  • streamlined fishing - just choose the location & go (as long as you have bait)
  • short conversations between Heather & Leimomi.

The full game will contain:

  • a full plot to explore with Leimomi
  • more fishing spots!
  • more fish & types of bait!
  • more complex fishing. before fishing, you'll need to choose your bait & fishing rig
  • custom music
  • polished art for Heather & Leimomi
